attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a great social injustice that a single person has to pay more than anyone else in the form of the socially unjust single supplement. I want a law to make the single supplement made illegal, and a further amendment to ensure that hoteliers (or anyone else) cannot raise their prices to compensate for there being no single supplement.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
